Home > misc > dist > stk_gpquadform.m

stk_gpquadform

PURPOSE

STK_GPQUADFORM computes a Gibbs-Paciorek quadratic form.

SYNOPSIS

function Q = stk_gpquadform(x, y, rx, ry, pairwise)

DESCRIPTION 

 STK_GPQUADFORM computes a Gibbs-Paciorek quadratic form.

 CALL: Q = stk_dist(X, Y, RX, RY)

    computes a matrix Q, whose entries Q(i,j) are given by a Gibbs-
    Paciorek quadratic form 

       Q(i,j) = \sum_{k = 1}^d (X(i,k) - Y(j,k))^2 / R(i,j,k)^2,

    where

       R(i,j,k)^2 = RX(i,k)^2 + RY(i,k)^2,

    assuming that

     * X and RX have size [nX d],
     * Y and RY have size [nY d].

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

0045 function Q = stk_gpquadform(x, y, rx, ry, pairwise)
0046 
0047 if nargin > 5,
0048    stk_error ('Too many input arguments.', 'TooManyInputArgs');
0049 end
0050 
0051 % read argument #1
0052 if isstruct(x),
0053     x = x.a;
0054 end
0055 
0056 % read argument #2
0057 if isstruct(y),
0058     y = y.a;
0059 end
0060 
0061 % read argument #4
0062 if nargin < 4,
0063     if isempty(y)
0064         ry = rx;
0065     else
0066         errmsg = 'Not enough input arguments.';
0067         stk_error(errmsg, 'NotEnoughInputArgs');
0068     end
0069 else
0070     if isempty(y) && ~isempty(ry) && ~isequal(rx, ry)
0071         errmsg = 'ry should be empty or equal to rx';
0072         stk_error(errmsg, 'IncorrectArgument');
0073     end
0074 end
0075         
0076 
0077 % read argument #5
0078 if nargin < 5,
0079     pairwise = false;
0080 else
0081     if ~islogical(pairwise)
0082         errmsg = 'Argument ''pairwise'' should be either true or false.';
0083         stk_error(errmsg, 'TypeMismatch');
0084     end
0085 end
0086 
0087 if pairwise,
0088     if isempty(y),
0089         Q = zeros(size(x, 1), 1);
0090     else
0091         Q = stk_gpquadform_pairwise(x, y, rx, ry);
0092     end
0093 else
0094     if isempty(y),
0095         Q = stk_gpquadform_matrixx(x, rx);
0096     else
0097         Q = stk_gpquadform_matrixy(x, y, rx, ry);
0098     end
0099 end
0100 
0101 end % function stk_gpquadform
